name: market for liquefied petroleum gas | liquefied petroleum gas | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8329/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'liquefied petroleum gas', in the geography of Switzerland.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;liquefied petroleum gas' is a fossil fuel with a calorific value of 45.5 MJ/kg. It is used as a liquid fuel and is sourced from petroleum refineries. Its main applications are in the following sectors: domestic cooking and heating and automotive fuel.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'liquefied petroleum gas',  within the geography of Switzerland.

This activity ends with the supply of 'liquefied petroleum gas',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are considered.
